description: Samuel O'Toole thought his new roommate, Hayden Michaels seemed like a pretty cool guy.  Quiet, neat, the perfect dude with whom to live.  Hayden definitely didn't seem like a creep or anything like that.  But as Samuel makes plans with his friend on the phone, Hayden watches.  As Sammy undresses for a shower, Hayden is hiding in the room, touching himself.  When he goes into the bathroom, Hayden emerges to rub his face and bare dick with Sammy's underwear.  Returning to the closet before Samuel can catch him, Hayden waits and watches.  Sammy's younger friend, Matthew Keading, stops by to visit.  Soon Matthew and Samuel are taking turns sucking each other's hard cocks.  Hayden still watches, but now strokes his own boner while taking pleasure in the private show he's found.  When Samuel slides his massive, throbbing meat pole into Matthew's tight, waiting ass, Hayden can scarcely believe what he's seeing.  His new roommate is the sexiest hunk he's ever witnessed.  But when Samuel hears a peep from the closet, Hayden gets his just deserts...all over his face and chest.Enjoy!
series: S088 - Samuel O'Toole, Matthew Keading & Hayden Michaels
title: Closet Case
